CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 1, 1954, pg. 17, reads: "Heagy - Spalding Inquest Scenes - Hearing Room Scene - Just before the Tuesday afternoon hearing, the room was crowded. Later, it was jammed with witnesses and spectators.  Mrs. William H. Heagy, widow of the slain officer, and her son, James H. Heagy, is pictured in front row, the second third [sic] persons from the left. - All Photos by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Women and men gathered at Heagy - Spalding inquest, including Mrs. William H. Heagy wearing striped dress on left, James H. Heagy third from left, and P. L. Prattis wearing bow tie fourth from right, and Atty. Richard Jones wearing striped tie and eyeglasses on right
